EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Security Workshop_DC_Q217.FieldMktg2017_Reminder_No_T
EmailTemplate.subject: EVENT POSTPONED: Cloud-Native Security Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, This email is to inform you that the Cloud-Native Security Workshop in Washington, DC on June 29th has been postponed. We apologize for this inconvenience.
Date: Date (POSTPONED)
Time:
9:00AM to 3:00PM
Location: Pivotal DC Venue Address City, State, ZIP (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Ponce+City+Market,+675+Ponce+De+Leon+Ave+NE,+Atlanta,+GA+30308/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x88f50410912c7be9:0x275114353ab5ce34?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjihMixwoPSAhWowlQKHY0MCAMQ8gEIGTAA]]>)
We will update you as soon as the workshop is rescheduled.
In the meantime, be sure to read all about cloud-native security and how to reduce risk in the enterprise here <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-security]]>. Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please contact us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Cloud-Native-Security-Workshop-DC.html]]>
